selected_quotes: UK bystander defib: low due to lack of confidence, lack of training location of #AEDs
Bystander #CPR rates directly related to #CardiacArrest survival rates GD Perkins et al 2015
Fantastic commentary here about improving outcomes from out-of-hospital cardiac arrest in England.
Great EMJ article - improving survival in pre-hosp cardiac arrest. Basics well, no mention of ECLS
EMERMED : Emergency Medicine Journal Improving Outcomes in OHCA
